# rclone size

Prints the total size and number of objects in remote:path.

## Synopsis

Prints the total size and number of objects in remote:path.

```
rclone size remote:path [flags]
```

## Options

```
  -h, --help   help for size
      --json   format output as JSON
```

See the [global flags page](/flags/) for global options not listed here.
